But I shop there a lot and I think spent $150.00 bucks in the last month and just settle for the customer service as it is.

text: This is the 2nd time I have bought a product from this store. Both products broke within a week and because all sales are final there's nothing that can be done. The pink haired girl behind the counter was annoyed by having to help customers.  She also lied about a product that cost me 30 dollars.

text: Staff member forced me and my lady to wear masks, believe her name was MJ , while not wearing hers or making other customers wear a mask. I was told I wasn't going to be allowed to enter without mask yet the employee herself wasn't wearing hers nor were other customers forced as we were. Hypocrisy at its finest.

resp.text: Meemaw, we sincerely apologies for this incident. Our policy is to follow current government mandates and require that everyone in the store wears masks. If staff was not complying and enforcing this policy selectively we will be sure to look into it and make the necessary changes. I can assure you this will not happen again. Once again I'm sorry for your experience and thank you for the feedback, we hope you will give us another chance.

name: Melissa Carter
text: OMG. I went to this store with one goal, a new toy that was blue tooth and would work with my music. Only problem, the clerk was not knowledgeable about the product or was just trying to make a sell. I purchased the Jive by We-Vibe. Not a bad product but the wrong product. So if they tell you this particular product works with your music, LIES. I paid $160 for it and you can get it on the We-Vibe site for $120, bc it doesn’t work with music. And of course you can’t return it. I think I deserve to have what I asked the clerk for.

My husband just took me to this store last night. They have a great variety of items and the store is very clean and well kept. The people there are nice, open, and willing to answer any questions you have about any of their products.

I myself was looking for a natural lubrication because my skin is sensitive and most natural selections are sticky and you don't have many options, they had a good amount of options to pick from in the natural lubrication section and even asked a few questions that would help them find exactly what I was looking for.

I definitely plan on purchasing from x-mart again because of this experience.

text: I was in their store a few days ago and the I have to say I’m severely disappointed by the lack of diversity in products. Over priced, poor quality, terrible customer service, and plain unprofessional business tactics when dealing with customers. If they aren’t outright ignoring you, they pressure you, follow you around the store and make you feel so uncomfortable just being in the store. I will never go back, and I highly recommend people take their business else where, especially if you are wanting a pleasant shopping experience. I have never felt like my business was so unwanted, or that my business would be considered a nuisance to THEIR ESTABLISHMENT. Highly HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND YOU SPEND YOUR MONEY THEIR.

name: TJ Sampson
text: My wife and I stopped in while traveling,  we were bored at the hotel so went exploring and stumbled across this place. Wow. It's certainly not what you think of when you picture an adult store. It was bright, CLEAN, and inviting. NONE of the sleazy aspects you normally expect.  Both employees were attractive young women who were cheerful, professional and very knowledgeable. The atmosphere made it easy and comfortable to ask questions. They took the 'taboo' and embarrassment out of the experience. We learned so much about the toys and functions as well as care and cleaning. Superb service. The knowledge alone was worth the trip. If you are a couple or young woman that is nervous about such things, or curious, I highly recommend going here first.

We were shown the most expensive products and other items that had questionable efficacy. We bought some of the suggested items, to our eventual disappointment. One toy broke the same night, the other highly recommend items did not work as the employee had said it would. We were very disappointed. Looking back on the experience as a hole, the scene was definitely a typical dirty sex shop, employee persona included. Long story short, WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!!!

text: I’ve been here so many times and the employees ruin it. I’ve seen (and smelled) them drinking alcohol while working and talking to visitors. One of the young men was once even trying to be discrete in the parking lot when selling or giving out what appeared to be pills of some sort. Sometimes there have been groups of people appearing to be idly standing around just talking to the employees. Prices are noticeably jacked up if you look at amazon or any other site or store for comparison, you will find much more reasonably priced items. Expected more professionalism, even if it is an adult store. I’ve even seen the use of those vape pens while inside by employees. Have not been pleased with my experiences here.

name: Angi Whatley
text:
My husband and I stopped by this store while we were in Huntsville for some new toys. The blonde sales lady that helped us was excellent. One of the toys we purchased malfunctioned that same evening. The store was closed the next day and we were traveling home (5 hours away) so I called the store on the following day to get a replacement. I left a message with my information. Never heard a word from the store. I called back and I was told I could bring the toy back and they would troubleshoot it and/or replace it. I explained that I live 5 hours away. The sales lady said she would have the manager call me back that same day. I haven’t heard a word from the manager and I am very disappointed in their customer service. I was originally told that the product I purchased had a year warranty and if I had any issue at all to let the store know. This toy was expensive! Buyer beware!!!

Update: the owner of Sultry reached out to me and was wonderful! My toy will be replaced and I am satisfied! This is a very nice store.

resp.text:
Hello Angi,
I’m so sorry you experienced any issues with covering the warranty under Sultry’s 30 days. We tried to follow up the day of (May 7th) but we were informed you were at a graduation and you would not be able to answer. Tiffany  contacted you the next day (May 8th) and left a message on your voicemail that we could ship out the replacement with no issues due to the distance.

I’m sorry there was a hiccup but we always try to make things right for our clients. If you would like to call and continue with the options we left on your voicemail we will gladly follow through with the warranty exchange.

Please contact Tiara to further assist 2568804884.

* Called and left a message today May 15th to provide more assistance.
Thank you
